posts.title: Day 1: #100DaysOfCode Begins 🚀
posts.description: Starting my web dev journey with HTML, CSS & JS basics. Built a Cat Photo Website on FreeCodeCamp & a Cafe Menu. 8 hours/day for 100 days. Let's do this 💪!

posts.title: Day 2: #100DaysOfCode - Input & Variables 🚀
posts.description: Day 2 of #100DaysOfCode: Learning input and variables in Python. Built a program to take user input and store it in a variable. 📚💻

posts.title: Day 3: #100DaysOfCode - Concatenation 💪
posts.description: Day 3 of #100DaysOfCode: Mastering concatenation in Python. Fixed common coding errors and built a Cat Photo Website on FreeCodeCamp. 🐈💻

posts.title: Day 4: #100DaysOfCode - Functions 🎉
posts.description: Day 4 of #100DaysOfCode: Exploring functions in Python. Learned how to define and call functions to make code more efficient. 📚💻

posts.title: Day 5: #100DaysOfCode - Lists 📝
posts.description: Day 5 of #100DaysOfCode: Working with lists in Python. Learned how to create, index, and manipulate lists. 📚💻

posts.title: Day 6: #100DaysOfCode - Conditional Statements 🤔
posts.description: Day 6 of #100DaysOfCode: Understanding conditional statements in Python. Learned how to use if-else statements to control program flow. 📚💻

posts.title: Day 7: #100DaysOfCode - Loops 🔄
posts.description: Day 7 of #100DaysOfCode: Mastering loops in Python. Learned how to use for and while loops to iterate over data. 📚💻

posts.title: Day 8: #100DaysOfCode - Dictionaries 📚
posts.description: Day 8 of #100DaysOfCode: Working with dictionaries in Python. Learned how to create and manipulate dictionaries. 💻

posts.title: Day 9: #100DaysOfCode - Object-Oriented Programming 📈
posts.description: Day 9 of #100DaysOfCode: Exploring object-oriented programming in Python. Learned how to define classes and objects. 📚💻

posts.title: Day 10: #100DaysOfCode - File Input/Output 📁
posts.description: Day 10 of #100DaysOfCode: Learning file input/output in Python. Learned how to read and write files. 📚💻
